data.text: @nzherald It's not the virus that's driving these businesses to bankruptcy, it's government Covid policy.
@meo63141067 @nzherald When one door closes, another opens. They'll find something more productive to do.
@FrogmarchWasp4 @nzherald what with? dole money? Thatd be a lot of people outta work
@nzherald Half of the shops in town were closed today due to self isolating staff.  I’m not sure how these businesses pay their rent, sick leave, acc, taxes … https://t.co/i7DQp0l7d7
@nzherald Eating out is such a waste of money. If we got rid of restaurants and bars maybe people would start saving.

@nzherald People may have to co-exist with Covid eventually. app Bost makes it safe and easy to communicate with users nearby. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/6mh07Pf1KU
